name: Flame of Prometheus
description:
4-22: Web build works now, but is very choppy on the first level. Working on solution.

As a messenger of Prometheus himself, you must evade the gods and bring the gift of fire to the people of the world!

Use WASD to move. The gift of fire is very sensitive, so dont run into anything!

You also only have a short amount of time to reach your destination. The life bar will slowly drain over time.
